lore: When Sigmund cast his curse, this creature appeared in the country. It is believed that its existence is linked to the curse, that destroying it is one of the conditions to end it. It can tear through time with its knife and create temporal rifts with which to move to other eras. The dark lord is said to have disappeared through a rift when he was about to be defeated by Helmholtz and Milner. Another theory is that Sigmund became this creature, and all these events were orchestrated by Vertraag.
menagerieDialog: (Its baby is crying, but it doesn't seem to care.)
(You can't help but wonder whose baby it's holding. On second thought, you'd rather not know.)
(Its baby begins to cry. It must not like you very much.)
(The baby is screaming for its mother.)
(This is, without a doubt, one of the most disturbing creatures in the world. Personally, you can't imagine ever settling down to have children yourself.)
name: Woeful Spectre
